LanguageData.Rhy_PhaseSnare_Beacon.label: phase snare beacon
LanguageData.Rhy_PhaseSnare_Beacon.description: This device is used to provide location information to the terminal. The map where it is located will be able to use the phase teleportation function.
LanguageData.Rhy_PhaseSnare_Core.label: phase snare core
LanguageData.Rhy_PhaseSnare_Core.description: Teleport enemies captured by the Phase Snare to this location, stunning them for about 5 seconds.
